review: This device works well for movies but not for weekly series downloads, specifically on Hulu TV. It constantly freezes and you only hear audio. I called Amazon techs & they forwarded my request to Hulu. But I was told that the Hulu team has to get the request & address it on their end. So far I haven't heard a word back from either Hulu or Amazon on a resolution to this problem.

review: It is small and quick. I hadn't planned on buying it but we were having trouble with our SONY Blu-ray player's Wi-Fi so I decided to purchase the "Fire." Again, its extremely fast and has a great deal of Apps and features.The only regret I have is that I should have bought it on sale a few months ago. I'll be surprised if cable TV will last 4 more years. This device, and others like it, will drive cable into complete obsolescence. The king is dead, long live the Fire.
